SummaryEnglish: As a punishment for his selfish behavior, an enchantress turns a young prince into a beast with a spell that can only be broken by true love's kiss. When a young woman named Belle agrees to stay at the castle in exchange for her captive father's freedom, she begins to draw the cold-hearted Beast out of his isolation with the help of his castle's servants — now household objects — including the matronly Mrs. Potts.
